articles.author: Seth G. Macy
articles.title: Twitter Considering Paid, Premium Version for Some Users - IGN
articles.description: Twitter wants to make its service more valuable to "marketers, journalists, professionals, and others."

articles.title: Xbox Free Games with Gold Gets Ryse & More  - IGN Daily Fix - IGN Video
articles.description: Microsoft details their Games With Gold lineup for April, Destiny 2's latest news and expected launch, and today's biggest stories.

articles.author: Luke Reilly
articles.title: Outlast 2 Will Come Out in Australia After All - IGN
articles.description: Outlast II has been reclassified R18+ for "high impact horror themes, violence, blood, gore and sex."

articles.author: Josh Lasser
articles.title: The Blackcoat's Daughter Review - IGN
articles.description: Emma Roberts, Kiernan Shipka and Lucy Boynton star in the horror-thriller about students stuck alone at a private school during break.

articles.author: Daemon Hatfield
articles.title: Game Scoop! 429: A Leak Points to The Evil Within 2's Release Date  - IGN
articles.description: This week on IGN's video game talk show: The Evil Within 2, Super Mario Odyssey, Zelda, and more.

articles.title: Ghost Recon Wildlands - Modes That We Want to See - IGN Video
articles.description: Fran and James chat about what modes they want to see added in Ghost Recon Wildlands that currently are not on the horizon

articles.author: Alex Osborn
articles.title: Disney Considering Another 'Decade and a Half of Star Wars Stories' - IGN
articles.description: How the company is handling The Last Jedi in the wake of Carrie Fisher's death was also addressed.

articles.author: Alex Osborn
articles.title: Alan Tudyk on Uncharted 4: 'I Don't Play That Game' - IGN
articles.description: The Firefly and Rogue One star said he's always been partial to Halo.

articles.title: Rocking a Stone Talus With a Split Joy-Con - Linked Together Episode 4 - IGN Video
articles.description: Brian and Zach take on a Stone Talus with a bunch of wooden weapons and a separated joy con with surprising results.

articles.title: The 5 Best and 2 Worst New Anime from Winter 2017 - IGN Video
articles.description: From elaborate high school romances to demihumans, these are the best and worst new anime of winter 2017.
